description:
Wolf has quit his job at the bakery and spends some time with his friend Tiger.   Mr. Penguin hasn’t been visiting the café recently; it seems he has found a new café…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ookami-kun no Tenshoku / Penguin-san no Atarashii Koi
Wolf`s Occupation Change / Mr. Penguin`s New Love!
オオカミくんの転職 / ペンギンさんの新しい恋
